channel.title: Priest (Blue Dragon Support) and Soulcatcher (Unseen Support)
channel.description:
> Priest (Blue Dragon Support) > > Passive: Call of the Dead: Speak to the dead at night. > > Night Ability 1: Power of the Dead: Use the primary power of a person who died last night. You may not use any ability that directly kills a target, or converts them. Unlimited Uses > > Night Ability 2: Strength of the Dead: Same as Power of the Dead, but uses secondary ability. Unlimited Uses
> Soulcatcher (Unseen Support) > > Passive: Call the Darkness: Dead Unseen may speak to the Unseen while this is alive. > > Night Ability 1: Power of the Dead: Use the primary power of a person who died last night. You may not use any ability that directly kills a target. Unlimited Uses > > Night Ability 2: Strength of the Dead: Same as Power of the Dead, but uses secondary ability. Unlimited Uses
Notes: Reintroduces Priest, but also gives it a neat, versatile ability so the class isn't boring.

item.title: Priest (Blue Dragon Support) and Soulcatcher (Unseen Support)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
It’s meant to be a jack of all trades kind of class. Necromancer is the perfect role to do it with. Also, the dynamics are much different when you are not part of the Coven (a poorly thought out faction), so it will probably played in drastically different ways.

Read full topic

item.title: Priest (Blue Dragon Support) and Soulcatcher (Unseen Support)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Everything is a mix. Knight Guards and Kills. Phys heals and reanimated. Butler occupies and kills king. I would like a pure Spy and a pure vote manipulator, but don’t change it until we have both.

Read full topic

item.title: Priest (Blue Dragon Support) and Soulcatcher (Unseen Support)
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
But it should either be a spy or a vote manipulator

I don’t care which, but the mix is disgusting imo

Read full topic

item.title: Priest (Blue Dragon Support) and Soulcatcher (Unseen Support)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Noble should keep Maid Spy. No reason not to. It doesn’t unbalance the game in any way. Especially if no other BD class has it.

Read full topic
item.source: Priest (Blue Dragon Support) and Soulcatcher (Unseen Support)

item.title: Priest (Blue Dragon Support) and Soulcatcher (Unseen Support)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
If you really want a class focused on vote manip then make it it’s own class instead of trying to rework the noble. Noble has been about spying for far longer than he has been about vote manip and he has been better for it.

Read full topic

item.source: Priest (Blue Dragon Support) and Soulcatcher (Unseen Support)

item.title: Priest (Blue Dragon Support) and Soulcatcher (Unseen Support)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Priest (Blue Dragon Support)

Passive: Call of the Dead: Speak to the dead at night.

Night Ability 1: Power of the Dead: Use the primary power of a person who died last night. You may not use any ability that directly kills a target, or converts them. Unlimited Uses

Night Ability 2: Strength of the Dead: Same as Power of the Dead, but uses secondary ability. Unlimited Uses

Soulcatcher (Unseen Support)

Passive: Call the Darkness: Dead Unseen may speak to the Unseen while this is alive.

Night Ability 1: Power of the Dead: Use the primary power of a person who died last night. You may not use any ability that directly kills a target. Unlimited Uses

Night Ability 2: Strength of the Dead: Same as Power of the Dead, but uses secondary ability. Unlimited Uses

Notes: Reintroduces Priest, but also gives it a neat, versatile ability so the class isn’t boring.

Read full topic
item.source: Priest (Blue Dragon Support) and Soulcatcher (Unseen Support)
